divs: sighting detailsi was outside in august. it was sunset\dusk i was smoking a cigarette and notice this object coming towards the barn. i was memorized on its pulsating features, as i got much closer, i ran in and got my camera. i ended up getting 6 minutes of footage going from dusk to dawn. i feel compelled to get it out. thanks ps i am doing this of my smart phone, video is in ky camera sd card. i have no computer.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Harrodsburg
There were no other sightings in Harrodsburg on or around August 16th 2011
Summary: I observed it for 20 minutes, I have 6 minute footage transitioning from dusk to dark.
